description:
Top Notes: Saffron & Blackcurrant

Heart Notes: Rose & Orris

Base Notes: Gaiac Wood, Vanilla & Leather

L for Women Floral Chypre With Rich Patchouli by Clive Christian is a Chypre Floral fragrance for women. L for Women Floral Chypre With Rich Patchouli was launched in 2017. The nose behind this fragrance is Angela Stavrevska. Top note is Flowers; middle notes are Rose and Jasmine Sambac; base note is Patchouli.

Top Notes: Lemon, Mandarin, Apple, Mango, Herbal Notes, Black Currant,
Apricot, Incense, Spicy Notes

Heart Notes: Cedar Wood, Jasmine, Rose, Iris, Russian Leather

Base Notes: Amber, Musk, Vanilla Madagascar

Top Notes: RASPBERRY NOTE, EXALTONE

Heart Notes: CACHALOX

Base Notes: ESSENCE OF BENZOIN, Heart OF PATCHOULI

Top Notes:
Aldehyde, Cinnamon, Mandarin

Heart Notes: Magnolia

Base Notes:
Agarwood, Black chocolate, Castoreum, Cedar, Musk, Sandalwood, Smoke, Tonka, Vanilla

Refill Kit includes:
50ml/1.7 O.Z filled bottle; empty 7.5ml/ 1 OZ spray bottle; funnel; Dropper; extra sprayer

TOP NOTES: African Marigold, Bergamot, Buchu

HEART NOTES: Cyclamen, Violet

BASE NOTES: Moroccan Cedarwood, Vetiver

TOP NOTES
Black cherry, Bitter orange, Saffron flower

HEART NOTES
Jasmine, Cloves, Cocoa

BASE NOTES
Iris, Almond, Brown sugar
Santal Royal by Guerlain is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Santal Royal was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Thierry Wasser.

Main Notes:
Agarwood Tropical Australia, Cinnamon Ceylon, Tobacco Leaves, Ylang Ylang Madagascar, Vanilla Tahiti, Sandalwood Australia, Incense

Top Notes: Orange blossom, Almond

Heart Notes: Rose absolute, Tobacco absolute

Base Notes, Tonka, Vanilla, Amyris wood essence, Amber woods

Top Notes: Cedrat, Nutmeg, Black Pepper.

Heart Notes: Turkish Rose, Orris, Violet.

Base Notes: Myrrh, Leather, Vetiver, Patchouli, Castoreum.

Main Notes:
Lily of the Valley, Passion Flower, Honeysuckle, Jasmin, Freesia, Amber, and Musk

Vibrato by Sospiro Perfumes is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Vibrato was launched in 2022. The nose behind this fragrance is Christian Provenzano. Top notes are Grapefruit, Bergamot, Jasmine and Magnolia; middle notes are Ginger, Herbal Notes and Powdery Notes; base notes are Musk, Cedar, Amber, Patchouli and Orris Root.

Top Notes
Royal cinnamon essence from Laos, Cinnamon tree leaves from Sri Lanka, Mandarin integral extract, Calamus essence India

Heart Notes
Nutmeg essence from Moluccas, Indonesan Pimento Berry essence, Indian White pepper absolute, Bulgarian rose extract

Base Notes
Olibanum extract Somalia, Ethiopian Myrrh extract, Yemení Opoponax extract, Styrax resin
